title: Wrong region to post in the PBE forum?
body:
I've recently joined the PBE servers, to test out a couple of the mechanics I saw were in the works.  After a couple dozen games, I wanted to give my feedback on the champ I've tested, but the PBE forums say I can't post because I'm "in the wrong region".  There is no option to change regions that I can find.

Does that honestly mean I can't contribute my feedback because I live in NA?  What am I missing here??

replies.body:
Hey Porglit,

Sorry for the confusion, the PBE Boards is a little odd in how it interacts with the rest of the region Boards. It's seen as it's own "region" in some ways, but isn't in other ways. 

Essentially it's determining that you're trying post from the NA "region" on the PBE "region" Boards. So you just need to log off of your NA account, go to the PBE Boards and sign into your PBE Boards.

The opposite is true, if you wanted to post on the NA Boards again, you'll need to log out of your PBE account and log back into your NA account.
Works perfectly when I do as you say.  Thanks!

For me, the PBE Boards tells me to "Login to comment", despite being logged in with my PBE account.

Tried clearing the browser cache, a different browser entirely - same result. Do I have to fulfill some requirements before I can post on the PBE Boards at all?
